case.name: Mahmoud v The Owners* Corporation Strata Plan 811 [2006] FCA 815 (29 June 2006)

citphrases.citphrase: refusal to serve notice of motion
rules re service of notice of motion
proper administration of justice. courts and judges
whether actual bias or reasonable apprehension of bias. jurisdiction
whether matters within associated jurisdiction. bankruptcy

citances.sentence: On 26 June 2006 the Federal Court heard the Applicant's ex parte application dealing with, amongst other things, the 23 May 2006 Orders, and the Applicant's "complaint concerning what he asserted to be the illegality and impropriety of the hearing before Barnes FM. " [5] Of that "sweeping allegation" the Federal Court found that the Applicant "was unable to articulate bases in law in support" thereof. [6] The Federal Court declined to grant interim relief. [7]
